About Me


Bio:

I am fascinated by the creative process that goes into web development/design and the challenging problems that come with it. I am also a fan of cats and aggressive music. Currently pursuing a BS degree in Computer Science at State University of New York at New Paltz.

Work Experience

Captate

Junior Developer (internship)

This was my first internship that took place the summer after my sophomore year of college. Captate is a PropTech company who's main objective is providing 3D tours of buildings (appartment, house, etc.) to clients. I utilized my skills in HTML, CSS, and Javascript and helped the lead developer to create these models. This internship also introduced me to the world of start-ups.
